item.title: Elliott asks for December special meeting at Southwest Airlines, cuts board slate to 8
item.description: Activist investor Elliott Management has requested a Dec. 10 special meeting date at Southwest Airlines, as it seeks to oust CEO Bob Jordan.

item.title: Meet 9 CFOs from the Fortune 500 ready to make the jump to CEO

item.description: Many say that AI isn’t even on the table of their boards, and it could cost them in the long run.

item.title: AI could be the drunk uncle in health care—or fix our broken systems
item.description: 'While the benefits of automating burdensome tasks are clear, it’s important to tread carefully,' writes Corti co-founder and CTO Lars Maaløe.

item.title: ServiceNow, Coreweave and others to invest $8.2 billion in UK data centers to fuel AI growth
item.description: American enterprise software giant ServiceNow and cloud computing startup CoreWeave plan to invest billions of dollars in their U.K. operations.
